trans-unit.source: Defines <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> criteria to select part-level or package-level relationships.
trans-unit.target: 定义 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> 条件来选择部分级或包级关系。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class to specify a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts to be signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> 由<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A>方法<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager>类，以指定的列表<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>部件进行签名。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> property of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> class to obtain a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts that have been signed with the given digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> 由<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A>属性<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>类来获取的列表<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>已签名与给定的数字签名的部分。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> (<c>SourceUri</c>="/") that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 拥有关系的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> （<c>SourceUri</c> =“/”） 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <c>selectionCriteria</c>, either by relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>selectionCriteria</c> 的类型，要么按关系 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" />，要么按关系 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The qualification string that is used to select the relationships based on the <c>selectorType</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用来基于 <c>selectorType</c> 选择关系的限定字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> or <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> 或 <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="selectorType" /> 参数无效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> but <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="selectorType" /> 参数是 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" />，但 <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> 不是有效的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceUri" /> is not the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root ("/") and is also not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> 根 （“/”），也不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The package from which to select the relationships based on the selection criteria.
trans-unit.target: 要基于选择条件从中选择关系的包。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> objects that match the defined <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" />, <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" />, and <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回与定义的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" />、<see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> 相匹配的 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" /> 对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of relationships that match the selection parameters specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 与指定给 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> 构造函数的选择参数相匹配的关系的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the selection criteria specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定给 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> 构造函数的选择条件。

trans-unit.source: The selection criteria based on the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 基于指定给 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> 构造函数的 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> 的 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> 的选择条件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取为 <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" /> 构造函数指定的 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: The selector type of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 指定给 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> 构造函数的 <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> 的选择器类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定给 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> 构造函数、作为关系所有者的根包 URI ("/") 或部分 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: The root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 指定给 <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> 构造函数、作为关系所有者的根包 URI ("/") 或部分 <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />。
